title: Washers & Dryers, Resort-worthy pool, Yoga & Spin Room
map_address: 2045 S. Forum Drive near Sara Jane Pkwy
posting_body: ['NEW APTS COMING 2021', 'Just in case you needed proof that life is good, here comes Copeland.', "This new apartment community in Grand Prairie will live up to the city's reputation of happy residents with vibrant social spaces and a resort-worthy pool & spa.", '(Did we mention there will be complimentary kombucha on tap in the game room?)', 'When staying home is in order, our fabulously appointed apartments come with all the bells and whistles.', 'Come on over to Copeland', 'and get happy.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 73', 'OR Text', '73', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 624 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Wood-Style Plank Flooring', '- Oversized Walk-In Closets & Additional Private Storage*', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Washers & Dryers', '- Quartz Countertops & Subway Tile Backsplashes', '- Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting', 'Community Amenities', '- Resort-worthy pool', '- Electric Vehicle (EV)', 'Charging Stations', '- Complimentary kombucha on tap', '- Dog Park', '- Yoga & Spin Room', '- Conference Room & Private Offices', '- 24-Hour Fitness Studio', '- Community Kitchen with Espresso Bar', '- Patio Lounge with Ping Pong & BBQ Grills', '- Game Room', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $25', 'Comments: At Copeland, we welcome your furry friends!', 'We charge a $350 non- refundable pet fee per pet and $25 monthly pet rent, per pet.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions apply.', 'All pets will require registration, photos, and records in <URL>, and an additional fee will apply.', 'Copeland', '2045 S. Forum Drive , Grand Prairie, TX, 75052', 'fNcqDRf5ltd6']
